markdown:
<title
    level="1"
    right="Feat 1"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Familiar](/Feats.aspx?ID=5024) <actions string="" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Magus" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=389" />
<trait label="Sorcerer" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=824" />
<trait label="Thaumaturge" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=432" />
<trait label="Wizard" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=735" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

**Source** [Player Core](/Sources.aspx?ID=216) pg. 201 <sup>2.0</sup>, [Player Core 2](/Sources.aspx?ID=227) pg. 152 <sup>1.1</sup>

**Archetypes** [Elementalist](/Archetypes.aspx?ID=98) (Level 4), [Shadowcaster](/Archetypes.aspx?ID=101) (Level 4), [Soul Warden](/Archetypes.aspx?ID=173) (Level 4), [Elementalist](/Archetypes.aspx?ID=207) (Level 4)

</column>

---

You make a pact with a creature that serves you and assists your spellcasting. You gain a [familiar](Familiars.aspx).
name: Familiar
